Baseball.headline: In Korea, Watching ‘Tiger King’ and Training for Baseball Alone
Baseball.snippet: Foreign players in the Korean Baseball Organization who went home during the peak of South Korea’s outbreak are self-isolating as the league aims to resume exhibitions later this month.

Football.headline: Mississippi State Football Coach Must Visit Civil Rights Museum After Noose Tweet

Football.headline: Tom Dempsey, Record-Setting Kicker, Dies at 73

Football.headline: How the N.F.L. Draft Process Works From Home

Football.headline: Carolina Releases Cam Newton, Completes Housecleaning

Football.headline: Mr. Consistency Leaves New England. No, Not Tom Brady.
Football.snippet: The Patriots released their longtime kicker, Stephen Gostkowski, the latest player to depart in their turbulent off-season.

Basketball.headline: The N.B.A. Should Crown a Champion. But Will the Title Count?

Basketball.headline: Kobe Bryant Headlines 2020 Basketball Hall of Fame Class

Basketball.headline: For This N.B.A. Rookie, Reality TV Is an Escape That Feels Like Home

Basketball.headline: Curly Neal, Globetrotters’ Dazzling Dribbler, Dies at 77

Hockey.headline: With Games Paused, Sports Companies Shift to Making Medical Supplies

Soccer.headline: In Britain, Summer Sports Cancellations Just Hit Different
